chunks.chunk_text: 想知道薪水入帳後該如何管理投資新手又該何時入場出國旅遊怎麼玩追什麼我是蔡尚樺邀請您來收聽玉山銀行全新Podcast玉山學堂在這裡我將和不同世代的來賓一起聊投資談消費分享最實用的理財觀念讓理財不只是數字而是更輕鬆更有趣的生活方式現在就點擊連結收聽一起開啟幸福人生

chunks.chunk_text: Hello歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事劇文我們這週來聽聽水果相關的文章吧Let's get started
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: You are an office worker who sits in front of a computer screen all day and after work swipes away on your mobile phone plays on a Nintendo Switch or other electronic devices you are at risk of diseases of affluence including tired and sore eyesTo avoid dry eye syndrome in addition to resting your eyes you can use eye massage techniques and eat nutritious foods to alleviate the symptoms
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: Smartphone addicts and office workers glued to screens all day often go for long periods without blinkingThis can lead to tiredness, dry eye syndrome and sore eyesAccording to ophthalmologist Wang MengqiGetting a good night's sleep and using a steam eye mask can helpHowever,Wang also recommends massaging acupressure points around the eye area
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: including the eyebrows, between and at the tips of the eyebrows, the temples, below the eye sockets and the corners of the eyes near the bridge of the noseWang advises massaging each of these areas in turn to relieve discomfortIn addition to massaging the eye area, nutritionist Gao Mingming also recommends eating certain foods such as seasonal watermelonwhich contains 90%
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: water and vegetables such as gherkin, cucumber and winter melon to relieve dry eye syndromeGao also recommends eating deep sea fish such as salmon, tuna, Pacific sari and mackerelwhich are rich in fish oils and can reduce inflammation one to three times a weekVegetable oil containing foods such as nuts are also beneficial to eye healthGao adds
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: Gao says a lack of vitamin A can increase the severity of dry eye syndromeSo in addition to taking in more oil rich foodsShe recommends supplementing the diet with starchy foods such as sweet potato or pumpkinVegetables such as red and yellow peppersFruits such as papaya, watermelon or cantaloupe melonand berry fruits such as blueberries
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: All of these foods contain anthocyanin says Gao which has antioxidant propertiesand is excellent at reducing inflammation

chunks.chunk_text: The Taiwanese press reported that consumers queued up to buy mangosteen from ThailandShe said the first lot of 980kg was sold out in only 30 minutesEach box of 4 mangosteens was sold at 200 baht
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: The unexpected positive response has proved a good opportunity for Thai exportersShe saidSince September 5thThai entrepreneurs have exported100,533kg of mangosteens to Taiwanwith more than 20 million bahtAccording to the director generalTaiwan's
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: Import standards require Thai mangosteens to undergo a steam treatmentfor decontamination and eradication of fruit fliesThe latter being the reason whyTaiwan had been rejecting fruitsfrom Thailand for the past 15 yearsWe have developed a techniqueto treat mangosteens at 46 degreesCelsius for 58 minuteswhich is the optimal temperature and time
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 水果相關時事趣聞 All about fruits.json

chunks.chunk_text: The taste of the fruits is not ruinedWhile meeting the requirements of theTaiwan Plant and Animal Disease Prevention and Quarantine OfficeSetsum suckI'm glad that althoughTaiwanese people haven't been able to enjoy Thai mangosteensfor 15 yearsThey still remember the exquisite tasteof this queen of fruitShe saidThis makes me confidentthat there is a bright futureahead for Thai fruit
